snippet: Eli Lilly officials said they remained hopeful that the experimental drug, which failed to stop progress of the disease in previous studies, could help patients with mild Alzheimer’s disease.
abstract: Eli Lilly & Co says it plans an additional study of experimental Alzheimer's drug that failed to improve the condition of people with disease, saying it remains hopeful about drug's prospects.
lead_paragraph: Eli Lilly officials said they remained hopeful that the experimental drug, which failed to stop progress of the disease in previous studies, could help patients with mild Alzheimer’s disease.

headline.seo: Eli Lilly to Conduct Additional Study of Alzheimer’s Drug
headline.main: Experimental Alzheimer’s Drug Will Get More Study at Eli Lilly
headline.print_headline: Experimental Alzheimer’s Drug Will Get More Study at Eli Lilly
